task.title: Creating Speakers
task.abstract: System Admins and staff users can add one or more speakers to a schedule item for Conference style events.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Speakers tab in the Events app and click New.
Select the Event using the lookup.
Enter the Speaker Name, Expertise Topic, and Status.
step.info: Status field must be set to Accepted in order for the Speaker details to display in the Community Portal.

step.cmd: Enter the Large Profile Photo URL to display a photo of the scheduled Speaker in the Community Portal.
Enter the Speaker's Bio and click Save.
Navigate to the Schedule related list on the Speaker record and click the New button.
Enter the Speaker Name, use the picklist to select the Speaker's Role, and use the lookup to select the related Schedule Item. Click Save.

taskbody.result: The Speaker is successfully added to the schedule item.
